```css
// Property: columnCount
// Description: The number of columns of items in the view.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.DashboardView
'.col-count-1': { columnCount: 1 }
'.col-count-2': { columnCount: 2 }
'.col-count-3': { columnCount: 3 }
'.col-count-4': { columnCount: 4 }
'.col-count-5': { columnCount: 5 }
'.col-count-6': { columnCount: 6 }
'.col-count-7': { columnCount: 7 }
'.col-count-8': { columnCount: 8 }
'.col-count-9': { columnCount: 9 }
'.col-count-10': { columnCount: 10 }
'.col-count-11': { columnCount: 11 }
'.col-count-12': { columnCount: 12 }
```
